definition: giving out or reflecting a lot of light
sentence: The sun was bright in the clear blue sky.

definition: occurring or done quickly and unexpectedly

definition: a situation in which a difficult choice has to be made

definition: to agree or have the same opinion

definition: having a ready insight into and understanding of things

definition: A division or contrast between two things that are represented as being opposed or entirely different.

definition: To take the work or ideas of someone else and pass them off as one's own.
